files.patch:
@@ -94,1 +94,1 @@
-        throws IOException
+        throws IOException, InterruptedException
@@ -166,0 +166,3 @@
+                            // We're not supposed to receive stray datagrams here,
+                            // so respin with 3 full seconds as this shouldn't happen too often
+                            Thread.sleep(3000);
@@ -171,1 +174,2 @@
-                            assertTrue(senderPort != localPort, "Unexpected message: localPort=" + localPort);
+                            assertTrue(senderPort != localPort,
+                                    "Unexpected message: localPort=" + localPort);
